overview: David Bowie toured the 'Glass Spider' across the world, from May to late November 1987, in promotion of his 'Never Let Me Down' album. This video was filmed over several nights at the Sydney Entertainment Centre in Australia during the last month of the tour. Originally released in 1988 on VHS (and then in 1999 on DVD in the Far East only), it was finally reissued on DVD in 2007.
title: David Bowie: Glass Spider
